name: FANCY MASON ARRANGEMENT: PINKS
description:
A fresh floral arrangement in a large Ball canning jar. Please note: we make deliveries tuesday, thursday, and friday evenings.

In the photos we used pink dahlias, green zinnias, white freesia, snowberries, ti leaves, maidenhair ferns, and coxcomb.

The fancy mason arrangement is a good size for a table or a small centerpiece. These arrangements have a "just picked from the garden" feel.

We use seasonal fresh flowers and whenever possible buy from local growers in and around the Portland Region. Flower types and colors will change depending on the season and the occasion. If you have something particular in mind please call the shop and let us know.

Comes complete with a hand typed love note, quote, or message from my vintage typewriter!

name: FANCY SMALL MASON
description:
A fresh floral arrangement in a small Ball canning jar. Please note: we make deliveries tuesday, thursday, and friday evenings.

In these photos we used dahlias, zinnias, basil, grasses, and salal leaves. The two wrapped jars also have roses, spray roses, blackberries, geranium leaves, and snowberry. Each jar is special and unique depending on what we have on hand and what is available seasonally.

The small fancy mason arrangement is a good size for a desk, table or a small centerpiece. These arrangements have a "just picked from the garden" feel.

We use seasonal fresh flowers and whenever possible buy from local growers in and around the Portland Region. Flower types and colors will change depending on the season and the occasion. If you have something particular in mind please call the shop and let us know.

name: STARGAZER LILIES
description:
A fresh floral arrangement in a bouquet or large Ball canning jar. Please note: we make deliveries tuesday, thursday, and friday evenings.

Large fragrant pink and white blooms fill this bouquet!

We use seasonal fresh flowers and whenever possible buy from local growers in and around the Portland Region. Flower types and colors will change depending on the season and the occasion. If you have something particular in mind please call the shop and let us know.

name: A DOZEN ROSES
description:
A fresh floral arrangement wrapped up in a bouquet or available in a clear glass vase. Please note: we make deliveries tuesday, thursday, and friday evenings.

In the photos we used red roses and maidenhair ferns.

Red roses: the timeless expression of love. Delight your sweetheart today with these amazingly fragrant and long lasting roses grown right here in Oregon.

Any other color of rose is available if you prefer.

We use seasonal fresh flowers and whenever possible buy from local growers in and around the Portland Region. Flower types and colors will change depending on the season and the occasion. If you have something particular in mind please call the shop and let us know.
